name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル6 無限地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun - Reberu Shikkusu: Mugen Jigoku

description: The deepest level of Impel Down prison where the world's most dangerous and notorious criminals are held. Prisoners on this level are so dangerous that their very existence is often erased from history. The level features stone cells and is characterized by oppressive darkness and absolute security.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Rescue Team Arrives at Level 6
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Ivankov, and Inazuma successfully reach Level 6 in their desperate attempt to rescue Ace.
keyEvents.significance: This marks the climax of the descent through Impel Down and the location where major alliances are formed.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Ace's Empty Cell
keyEvents.description: The rescue party discovers Ace's cell is empty - he has been transferred to Marine custody.
keyEvents.significance: A pivotal moment that changes the entire direction of the rescue attempt.

keyEvents.title: Hannyabal's Trap Sprung
keyEvents.description: Hannyabal activates a trap with sleeping gas, destroyed elevators, and blocked stairs to capture the intruders.
keyEvents.significance: Forces the rescue team to find alternative escape methods and form desperate alliances.

keyEvents.title: Crocodile Encountered in Level 6
keyEvents.description: Luffy encounters his former enemy Crocodile, imprisoned in Level 6 after his defeat in Alabasta.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the unlikely alliance between former enemies for the escape from Impel Down.

statusHistory.reason: Operational prison level housing dangerous criminals
